scripts.dev:up: cd deployment/dev && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build
scripts.dev:down: cd deployment/dev && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down
scripts.dev:logs: cd deployment/dev && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f --tail=100
scripts.dev:ps: cd deployment/dev && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps
scripts.dev:rebuild:api: cd deployment/dev && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build api && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d api
scripts.dev:rebuild:ai: cd deployment/dev && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build ai && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d ai
scripts.dev:rebuild:frontend: cd deployment/dev && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build frontend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d frontend
scripts.dev:logs:api: cd deployment/dev && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f api
scripts.dev:logs:ai: cd deployment/dev && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f ai
scripts.dev:logs:frontend: cd deployment/dev && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f frontend
scripts.dev:logs:cloudflared: cd deployment/dev && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f cloudflared
